import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

Hello! I'm Md Saiful Haque, a passionate MERN Stack Developer and recent computer science graduate with a strong foundation in modern web development technologies. My journey into programming began with curiosity about how websites work, and it has evolved into a deep love for creating meaningful digital experiences.

I specialize in building full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. What I enjoy most about development is the problem-solving aspect â€“ taking complex challenges and breaking them down into elegant, user-friendly solutions. I'm particularly drawn to projects that have real-world impact and can make a difference in people's lives.

My programming journey started during my college years when I first encountered HTML and CSS. The ability to create something visual and interactive from lines of code fascinated me. Since then, I've continuously expanded my skill set, learning new technologies and frameworks through personal projects, online courses, and hands-on practice.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, reading tech blogs, or working on personal projects. I also enjoy playing cricket, which has taught me valuable lessons about teamwork and strategic thinking that I apply to my development work. I believe in continuous learning and am always excited to take on new challenges that push my boundaries.

15+
Projects Completed
2+
Years Learning
{/* Decorative elements */}
); }; export default About;
